@title FiatToken V2.2
 @notice ERC20 Token backed by fiat reserves, version 2.2

@dev Internal function to get the current chain id.
 @return The current chain id.
@inheritdoc EIP712Domain
@inheritdoc Blacklistable
@inheritdoc FiatTokenV1
@inheritdoc FiatTokenV2
@inheritdoc FiatTokenV2
@inheritdoc FiatTokenV2

@title FiatToken V2.2
 @notice ERC20 Token backed by fiat reserves, version 2.2

@dev Internal function to get the current chain id.
 @return The current chain id.
@inheritdoc EIP712Domain
@inheritdoc Blacklistable
@inheritdoc FiatTokenV1
@inheritdoc FiatTokenV2

@inheritdoc FiatTokenV2

returns._0: The bytes32 EIP712 domain separator.
The remaining allowance.
True if the operation was successful.

authorizationState(address,bytes32).details: Nonces are randomly generated 32-byte data unique to the authorizer's address

returns._0: True if the nonce is used
balance The fiat token balance of the account.

burn(uint256).details: The caller must be a minter, must not be blacklisted, and the amount to burn should be less than or equal to the account's balance.

params._amount: the amount of tokens to be burned.

cancelAuthorization(address,bytes32,byte.details: Works only if the authorization is not yet used. EOA wallet signatures should be packed in the order of r, s, v.

params.signature: Signature bytes signed by an EOA wallet or a contract wallet

cancelAuthorization(address,bytes32,uint.details: Works only if the authorization is not yet used.

params.minterAllowedAmount: The minting amount allowed for the minter.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.
True if successful
True if successful

params.newBlacklister: The blacklister address for the fiat token.
params.newMasterMinter: The masterMinter address for the fiat token.
params.newOwner: The owner of the fiat token.
params.newPauser: The pauser address for the fiat token.
params.tokenCurrency: The fiat currency that the token represents.
params.tokenDecimals: The number of decimals that the token uses.
params.tokenName: The name of the fiat token.
params.tokenSymbol: The symbol of the fiat token.

params.lostAndFound: The address to which the locked funds are sent

params.accountsToBlacklist: A list of accounts to migrate from the old blacklist
params.newSymbol: New token symbol data structure to the new blacklist data structure.

returns._0: True if the account is blacklisted, false if the account is not blacklisted.
True if the account is a minter, false if the account is not a minter.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to mint. Must be less than or equal to the minterAllowance of the caller.
params._to: The address that will receive the minted tokens.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.
The remaining minter allowance for the account.
Next nonce

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

returns._0: the address of the owner

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,b.details: EOA wallet signatures should be packed in the order of r, s, v.

params.deadline: The time at which the signature expires (unix time), or max uint256 value to signal no expiration
params.signature: Signature bytes signed by an EOA wallet or a contract wallet

params.deadline: The time at which the signature expires (unix time), or max uint256 value to signal no expiration

receiveWithAuthorization(address,address.details: This has an additional check to ensure that the payee's address matches the caller of this function to prevent front-running attacks. EOA wallet signatures should be packed in the order of r, s, v.

params.signature: Signature bytes signed by an EOA wallet or a contract wallet
params.validAfter: The time after which this is valid (unix time)
params.validBefore: The time before which this is valid (unix time)

params.validAfter: The time after which this is valid (unix time)
params.validBefore: The time before which this is valid (unix time)

params.minter: The address of the minter to remove.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

The totalSupply of the fiat token.
True if the operation was successful.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: The caller must have some fiat token allowance on the payer's tokens.

returns._0: True if the operation was successful.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferWithAuthorization(address,addres.details: EOA wallet signatures should be packed in the order of r, s, v.

params.validBefore: The time before which this is valid (unix time)

params._newPauser: The address of the new pauser.

params.newRescuer: The address of the new rescuer.

returns._0: Version string

allowance(address,address).notice: Gets the remaining amount of fiat tokens a spender is allowed to transfer on behalf of the token owner.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Sets a fiat token allowance for a spender to spend on behalf of the caller.

authorizationState(address,bytes32).notice: Returns the state of an authorization

balanceOf(address).notice: Gets the fiat token balance of an account.

burn(uint256).notice: Allows a minter to burn some of its own tokens.

configureMinter(address,uint256).notice: Adds or updates a new minter with a mint allowance.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Decrease the allowance by a given decrement

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Increase the allowance by a given increment

isMinter(address).notice: Checks if an account is a minter.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints fiat tokens to an address.

minterAllowance(address).notice: Gets the minter allowance for an account.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Update allowance with a signed permit

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Update allowance with a signed permit

receiveWithAuthorization(address,address.notice: Receive a transfer with a signed authorization from the payer
Receive a transfer with a signed authorization from the payer

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Rescue ERC20 tokens locked up in this contract.

totalSupply().notice: Gets the totalSupply of the fiat token.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from an address to another by spending the caller's allowance.

transferWithAuthorization(address,addres.notice: Execute a transfer with a signed authorization
Execute a transfer with a signed authorization
